summary: The concept of future encompasses various transformative themes explored through articles. These themes include evolving ecosystems beyond traditional space and time constraints and the fragmentation and regeneration of the internet to create sustainable systems. Emphasis is laid on decentralization, non-hierarchical structures, and innovative practices drawn from diverse disciplines to foster resilient networks and communities.
excerpt: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
